# Tender Announcement for TESCAN Integrated Mineral Analyzer Services

## Notice Title:
Services for TESCAN Integrated Mineral Analyzer

## Reference Number:
PW-23-01029997

## Tender Status:
Expired

## Purchase Details:
### Description:
The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires a service contract for the TESCAN Integrated Mineral Analyzer (TIMA). The TIMA is a sophisticated characterization instrument used for quantitative mineralogical analyses, providing critical information for various research projects.

### Requirement Details:
- The equipment should be provided with excellent service with minimal delay, including preventive maintenance and timely exchange of replacement parts.
- Qualified personnel should promptly respond to service requests.

### Evaluation Criteria:
- Interested suppliers must demonstrate that they meet the following requirements:
  - Having access to replacement parts, manuals, and schematics for the TESCAN TIMA scanning electron microscope (SEM).
  - Having the authority to service, repair, and calibrate the TESCAN TIMA scanning electron microscope (SEM).

## Procurement Details:
### Method:
Competitive - Open bidding

### Category:
SRVTGD

### Regions:
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Delivery Region:
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contract Duration:
One year, with two one-year option periods, from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

### Estimated Value:
$60,000.00 (GST/HST extra)

## Pre-Identified Supplier:
TESCAN USA INC
765 COMMONWEALTH DRIVE
WARRENDALE, PA 15086-7520

## Instructions to Suppliers:
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the required services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the procurement advisor on or before the closing date of this notice. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

## Contact Information:
Brenda Harlow
Procurement Advisor
Brenda.Harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
